The Younger'sYoungers' live in a small apartementapartment in Chicago Southside.
They don't have much money and the livelife in simple living conditions.

The given scene is about an argument between Ruth and her husband Walter.
They argue because Ruth does not like the business idea of her husband and she does not like the friends of her husband.
Walter tries to defend his friends and his business idea but Ruth does not change her mind about his idea and his friends.
